attributes.action: Urge the BBC to sack  grossly offensive and trashy BBC DJs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Particular,we call for Jonathan Ross of Radio 2 to go,for his part in the bullying of Andrew Sachs and his grandaughter and most recently,Chris Moyles of Radio 1,who recently broadcast(19th November 2008) that Polish people would make good prostitutes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
